narrative.iWantTo: use the system without any errors

scenario.title: lecturer selects that a session is a one-off.
scenario.step: When session 10 is marked as one-off
Then session 10 is a one-off sessionjava.lang.NullPointerException

scenario.title: lecturer selects that a session is a weekly.
scenario.step: When session 10 is marked as weekly
Then session 10 is a weekly sessionjava.lang.NullPointerException

scenario.title: lecturer selects that a session is a fortnightly.
scenario.step: When session 10 is marked as fortnightly
Then session 10 is a fortnightly sessionjava.lang.NullPointerException

scenario.title: Student views all sessions in a course
scenario.step: When course 16 is selected from student 12
Then student 12 books all compulsory sessions of course 16

scenario.title: Student views all compulsory sessions in a course
scenario.step: When a student 12 selects a course 16
Then student 12 views all compulsory sessions of course 16
